title: Cannot select any item in library outline view at first attempt
description:
Description: When attempting to select any item in the library outline view, it cannot be selected on the first try. The focus instead jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the view.

Observed Behavior: Any item cannot be selected on the first attempt. The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Expected Behavior: The selected item should be highlighted and receive focus when clicked.
OB: Any item cannot be selected at the first time in the library outline view. The focus instead jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: On the second attempt, the label item can be selected as expected.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try selecting any item in the view.
3. Observe that the item cannot be selected at the first attempt and the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.
4. On the second attempt, try selecting the same label item.
5. Observe that the label item is now selected as expected.
